reviews.text: Heard about this the other day, realized it was at the Columbus Food Hall not too far for me, so I had to stop in. I love Asian food in general, Vietnamese,...
Everything was delicious spicy beef jerky with sticky rice, fried chicken wings, fried egg roll & Thai tea
Great Laos food in Columbus!  It was awesome how they had this in a Ghost Kitchen where you can choose from asian, soul, bbq, American, Mexican.
